title: Gold fever
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, George Cass, TV Ed Productions and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
brief_description: They came to get rich quickly and escape poverty in their homelands, but what they found was not always wealth. This program looks at life on the goldfields and discusses some of the problems that the diggers encountered. Sovereign Hill at Ballarat is featured.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, George Cass, TV Ed Productions and Victoria. Schools Division. Curriculum Branch
